fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Rainslasher__
Mainly useful for teams where Sayu can keep it's passive up, generally in Aggravate Sayu teams where she can reliably absorb Electro
__Mailed Flower__
Does require Sayu to trigger an Elemental Reaction or use an Elemental Skill, but this can be achieved through her Elemental Burst. (Note the passive lasts 8s and her held roll has a 11s cooldown.)

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa, Bloodtainted Greatsword, Favonius Greatsword, Makhaira Aquamarine, Forest Regalia
